articles.title: Fujifilm’s X Half camera is so dedicated to the analog vibes, it can’t shoot RAW - The Verge
articles.description: Fujifilm’s X Half is a 1-inch-type digital camera modeled after traditional half-frame film cameras. It has film simulations and filters for vintage looks.

articles.description: Dyson’s newest cordless vacuum, which won’t be available in the US until next year, is its thinnest yet with an all-new motor.

articles.description: Microsoft is battling for enterprise customers. Google wants to own consumer AI. In many ways, Microsoft has the easier fight.
